page.title: 03WEEKEND IN CASTLE BYTHAM.
page.content: On Saturday Clare rang me to ask if I would like to deliver the Glenside News with her.The Glenside News is a little magazine for the parishes of Castle Bytham,Little Bytham and Careby with Holywell and Aunby.I said "yes".She met me at my house with a black bag full of the magazines.We took it in turns to deliver them.Half way down Glen road I saw the two gypsies who had called at our house with a bag full of lace,but we didn't buy any.Clare said "Would you like to come to the plot? (which is where Clare's dad is building their new house).My dad is putting the stairs in." When we got there the stairs were in and Clare's dad said we could climb up.It was all right going up but coming down was a different matter!
